title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 2875/92 of 21 September 1992 abolishing certain quantitative restrictions and amending Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 288/82
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 2875/92  of 21 September 1992  abolishing certain quantitative restrictions and amending Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 288/82
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative restrictions on products falling within the CN codes listed in the Annex to this Regulation are hereby deleted from Annex 1 to Regulation (EEC) No 288/82.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
